chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
P: list bool -> Type
HP0: P nil
HPS: forall l m : list bool, list_bool_succ l m -> P l -> P m
n: nat

Goal:
forall l : list bool, list_bool_nat l = n -> P l

Premises:
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
list_bool_nat = fix list_bool_nat (l : list bool) : nat := match l with | nil => 1 | One :: l0 => 1 + 2 * list_bool_nat l0 | Zero :: l0 => 0 + 2 * list_bool_nat l0 end : list bool -> nat Arguments list_bool_nat _%list_scope
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
Inductive list_bool_succ : list bool -> list bool -> Prop := in_lbs_0 : forall (k : nat) (l : list bool), list_bool_succ (list_repeat One k ++ Zero :: l) (list_repeat Zero k ++ One :: l) | in_lbs_1 : forall k : nat, list_bool_succ (list_repeat One k) (list_repeat Zero (S k)) Arguments list_bool_succ (_ _)%list_scope Arguments in_lbs_0 _%nat_scope _%list_scope Arguments in_lbs_1 _%nat_scope
Tauto.X : ?TX -> Tauto.GFormula where ?TA : [P : list bool -> Type HP0 : P nil HPS : forall l m : list bool, list_bool_succ l m -> P l -> P m n : nat |- Type] ?TX : [P : list bool -> Type HP0 : P nil HPS : forall l m : list bool, list_bool_succ l m -> P l -> P m n : nat |- Type] ?AA : [P : list bool -> Type HP0 : P nil HPS : forall l m : list bool, list_bool_succ l m -> P l -> P m n : nat |- Type] ?AF : [P : list bool -> Type HP0 : P nil HPS : forall l m : list bool, list_bool_succ l m -> P l -> P m n : nat |- Type]
Tauto.A : ?TA -> ?AA -> Tauto.GFormula where ?TA : [P : list bool -> Type HP0 : P nil HPS : forall l m : list bool, list_bool_succ l m -> P l -> P m n : nat |- Type] ?TX : [P : list bool -> Type HP0 : P nil HPS : forall l m : list bool, list_bool_succ l m -> P l -> P m n : nat |- Type] ?AA : [P : list bool -> Type HP0 : P nil HPS : forall l m : list bool, list_bool_succ l m -> P l -> P m n : nat |- Type] ?AF : [P : list bool -> Type HP0 : P nil HPS : forall l m : list bool, list_bool_succ l m -> P l -> P m n : nat |- Type]
Tauto.I : Tauto.GFormula -> option ?AF -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula where ?TA : [P : list bool -> Type HP0 : P nil HPS : forall l m : list bool, list_bool_succ l m -> P l -> P m n : nat |- Type] ?TX : [P : list bool -> Type HP0 : P nil HPS : forall l m : list bool, list_bool_succ l m -> P l -> P m n : nat |- Type] ?AA : [P : list bool -> Type HP0 : P nil HPS : forall l m : list bool, list_bool_succ l m -> P l -> P m n : nat |- Type] ?AF : [P : list bool -> Type HP0 : P nil HPS : forall l m : list bool, list_bool_succ l m -> P l -> P m n : nat |- Type]
inr : ?B -> ?A + ?B where ?A : [P : list bool -> Type HP0 : P nil HPS : forall l m : list bool, list_bool_succ l m -> P l -> P m n : nat |- Type] ?B : [P : list bool -> Type HP0 : P nil HPS : forall l m : list bool, list_bool_succ l m -> P l -> P m n : nat |- Type]
inl : ?A -> ?A + ?B where ?A : [P : list bool -> Type HP0 : P nil HPS : forall l m : list bool, list_bool_succ l m -> P l -> P m n : nat |- Type] ?B : [P : list bool -> Type HP0 : P nil HPS : forall l m : list bool, list_bool_succ l m -> P l -> P m n : nat |- Type]
nil : list ?A where ?A : [P : list bool -> Type HP0 : P nil HPS : forall l m : list bool, list_bool_succ l m -> P l -> P m n : nat |- Type]
cons : ?A -> list ?A -> list ?A where ?A : [P : list bool -> Type HP0 : P nil HPS : forall l m : list bool, list_bool_succ l m -> P l -> P m n : nat |- Type]
None : option ?A where ?A : [P : list bool -> Type HP0 : P nil HPS : forall l m : list bool, list_bool_succ l m -> P l -> P m n : nat |- Type]
VarMap.Empty : VarMap.t ?A where ?A : [P : list bool -> Type HP0 : P nil HPS : forall l m : list bool, list_bool_succ l m -> P l -> P m n : nat |- Type]
EnvRing.Pc : ?C -> EnvRing.Pol ?C where ?C : [P : list bool -> Type HP0 : P nil HPS : forall l m : list bool, list_bool_succ l m -> P l -> P m n : nat |- Type]
EnvRing.PEX : BinNums.positive -> EnvRing.PExpr ?C where ?C : [P : list bool -> Type HP0 : P nil HPS : forall l m : list bool, list_bool_succ l m -> P l -> P m n : nat |- Type]
EnvRing.PEc : ?C -> EnvRing.PExpr ?C where ?C : [P : list bool -> Type HP0 : P nil HPS : forall l m : list bool, list_bool_succ l m -> P l -> P m n : nat |- Type]
VarMap.Elt : ?A -> VarMap.t ?A where ?A : [P : list bool -> Type HP0 : P nil HPS : forall l m : list bool, list_bool_succ l m -> P l -> P m n : nat |- Type]
EnvRing.PEadd : EnvRing.PExpr ?C -> EnvRing.PExpr ?C -> EnvRing.PExpr ?C where ?C : [P : list bool -> Type HP0 : P nil HPS : forall l m : list bool, list_bool_succ l m -> P l -> P m n : nat |- Type]
VarMap.Branch : VarMap.t ?A -> ?A -> VarMap.t ?A -> VarMap.t ?A where ?A : [P : list bool -> Type HP0 : P nil HPS : forall l m : list bool, list_bool_succ l m -> P l -> P m n : nat |- Type]
list_bool_succ_nat : forall l m : list bool, list_bool_succ l m -> 1 + list_bool_nat l = list_bool_nat m
list_bool_succ_neq : forall l m : list bool, list_bool_succ l m -> l <> m
nat_sorted_rect : forall P : list nat -> Type, P nil -> (forall x : nat, P (x :: nil)) -> (forall (x y : nat) (l : list nat), x < y -> P (y :: l) -> P (x :: y :: l)) -> forall l : list nat, nat_sorted l -> P l
NoDup_sind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> SProp), P nil -> (forall (x : A) (l : list A), ~ In x l -> NoDup l -> P l -> P (x :: l)) -> forall l : list A, NoDup l -> P l
NoDup_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> Prop), P nil -> (forall (x : A) (l : list A), ~ In x l -> NoDup l -> P l -> P (x :: l)) -> forall l : list A, NoDup l -> P l
list_injective_rect : forall (X : Type) (P : list X -> Type), P nil -> (forall (x : X) (l : list X), ~ In x l -> P l -> P (x :: l)) -> forall l : list X, list_injective l -> P l
list_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> Prop), P nil -> (forall (a : A) (l : list A), P l -> P (a :: l)) -> forall l : list A, P l
list_sind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> SProp), P nil -> (forall (a : A) (l : list A), P l -> P (a :: l)) -> forall l : list A, P l
list_rect : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> Type), P nil -> (forall (a : A) (l : list A), P l -> P (a :: l)) -> forall l : list A, P l
list_rec : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> Set), P nil -> (forall (a : A) (l : list A), P l -> P (a :: l)) -> forall l : list A, P l
Permutation.Permutation_ind_bis : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> list A -> Prop), P nil nil -> (forall (x : A) (l l' : list A), l ~p l' -> P l l' -> P (x :: l) (x :: l')) -> (forall (x y : A) (l l' : list A), l ~p l' -> P l l' -> P (y :: x :: l) (x :: y :: l')) -> (forall l l' l'' : list A, l ~p l' -> P l l' -> l' ~p l'' -> P l' l'' -> P l l'') -> forall l l' : list A, l ~p l' -> P l l'
ForallOrdPairs_ind : forall (A : Type) (R : A -> A -> Prop) (P : list A -> Prop), P nil -> (forall (a : A) (l : list A), Forall (R a) l -> ForallOrdPairs R l -> P l -> P (a :: l)) -> forall l : list A, ForallOrdPairs R l -> P l
ForallOrdPairs_sind : forall (A : Type) (R : A -> A -> Prop) (P : list A -> SProp), P nil -> (forall (a : A) (l : list A), Forall (R a) l -> ForallOrdPairs R l -> P l -> P (a :: l)) -> forall l : list A, ForallOrdPairs R l -> P l
rev_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> Prop), P nil -> (forall (x : A) (l : list A), P l -> P (l ++ x :: nil)) -> forall l : list A, P l
Permutation.Permutation_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> list A -> Prop), P nil nil -> (forall (x : A) (l l' : list A), l ~p l' -> P l l' -> P (x :: l) (x :: l')) -> (forall (x y : A) (l : list A), P (y :: x :: l) (x :: y :: l)) -> (forall l l' l'' : list A, l ~p l' -> P l l' -> l' ~p l'' -> P l' l'' -> P l l'') -> forall l l0 : list A, l ~p l0 -> P l l0
